title: Report content or issues
description: MapX reporting system allows you to send a message anonymously and directly to the right people. Any abuse of this tool could lead to a temporary ban of our IP and that's the only case where we would store identifiable data. For more details you can visit our GitHub repository

type.title: Report Type
type.description: The type of report or issue being submitted

includeActivatedViews.title: Include current activated views list
includeActivatedViews.description: Add current activated views id to the message for easier reviewing and context

includeMapConfig.title: Include map configuration
includeMapConfig.description: Add map current extent, zoom, theme, globe mode, aerial view, for easier reviewing and context

contactEmail.title: Contact Email
contactEmail.description: Optional email address for follow-up communication. Invalid email will be ignored.
